name: NextFolderTask
description: Generate the next folder name on basis of an increment viz. RC3 if RC1, RC2 are present.
author: Dushyant Priyadarshee
instanceNameFormat: Check $(folderToCheck) for existing folders with prefix $(folderNamePrefix).

inputs.name: folderToCheck
inputs.label: Folder to check.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder location to check for existing folder to generate next name. Viz. //fileshare//ReleaseCandidates which could have RC1, RC2, then RC3 will be the result.

inputs.name: folderNamePrefix
inputs.label: Prefix of folder.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder name prefix viz. RC is the prefix in RC1.
